LanguageData.DMS_GAU19Gatlinggun.label: GAU-19/A "Attacker"
LanguageData.DMS_GAU19Gatlinggun.description:
A rapid-firing multiple-barrel firearm chambered in heavy machinegun rounds.
This weapon is designed specifically for automatroid use, thus a standard baseline human may be unable to use them normally without external assistance from specialized equipment or being extra strong.
LanguageData.DMS_GAU19Gatlinggun.tools.stock.label: stock
LanguageData.DMS_GAU19Gatlinggun.tools.barrel.label: barrel
LanguageData.DMS_GAU4Gatlinggun.label: GAU-4 "Vulcan"
LanguageData.DMS_GAU4Gatlinggun.description: A rapid-firing multiple-barrel weapon platfrom chambered in autocannon rounds.
LanguageData.DMS_GAU4Gatlinggun_Hold.label: GAU-4 "Vulcan"
LanguageData.DMS_GAU4Gatlinggun_Hold.description:
A rapid-firing multiple-barrel firearm chambered in standard autocannon rounds.
This weapon is designed specifically for automatroid use, and it's too heavy so only specific automatroids can operate the weapons system.
LanguageData.DMS_GAU8Gatlinggun.label: GAU-8 "Avenger"
LanguageData.DMS_GAU8Gatlinggun.description:
A rapid-firing multiple-barrel firearm chambered in high-cailber autocannon rounds, deadly and destructive.
This weapon is designed specifically for automatroid use, and it's too heavy so only specific automatroids can operate the weapons system.
LanguageData.DMS_GAU8Gatlinggun.tools.stock.label: stock
LanguageData.DMS_GAU8Gatlinggun.tools.barrel.label: barrel
LanguageData.DMS_M214Gatlinggun.label: M214
LanguageData.DMS_M214Gatlinggun.description:
A rapid-firing multiple-barrel firearm chambered in assault rifle rounds.
This weapon is designed specifically for automatroid use, thus a standard baseline human may be unable to use them normally without external assistance from specialized equipment or being extra strong.
LanguageData.DMS_M214Gatlinggun.tools.stock.label: stock
LanguageData.DMS_M214Gatlinggun.tools.barrel.label: barrel
